faq.title: Are you local painters?
faq.expand: We are locally owned and operated, based in the Kansas City area, we provide professional painting services in Overland Park and surrounding cities in Johnson County (including Lee's Summit, Roeland Park, Leawood, Shawnee, Olathe, Prarie Village, and Lenexa).

faq.title: How Long Will Painting Take?
faq.expand:
On average homes we paint take 3.5 days. Small, 1 level homes can be quicker and take 2, depending on the condition they’re in. Large multi level homes with lots of trim (such as those in Westport or Brookside) can take 1 to 2 weeks.

The time it will take to paint your home will depend on the condition your home is in, your expectations and needs, and the size of your house. Our estimator will be able to give you a good approximation of the time it will take to paint your home after meeting with you.

faq.title: How Much Does Exterior Painting Project Cost?
faq.expand:
This varies widely based on home, condition, what you want, etc… Our average project price in 2021 was around $6,500. This average includes all materials and often wood rot repairs. Smaller homes we work on can be between $3k and $4k and larger homes we’ve worked on can be $20k or more.

We understand that everyone has a different budget and our recommendation is that you provide us with as much information as possible so that we can get you a project that accomplishes the things that are most important to you within your budget. Let our estimator know what your budget is and we’re confident that we can provide you with options to work in your budget.

faq.title: Do You Spray, Spray and Backroll, or Brush and Roll the Paint?
faq.expand:
It depends on the surface we’re painting.

Over the last several years, we’ve not performed any brush and roll only projects. Brush and roll only takes considerably longer and is therefore considerably more expensive. If you are thinking you’d like brush and roll only, talk to you estimator about why and we can always price it as an option for you.

Spray and backroll is necessary when the surface being painted is porous (like an open grained wood) or dry (like stucco being painted for the first time). In order to provide a uniform finish that looks great, the paint needs to be pushed down into the pores. During your walkaround with your estimator, we’ll point out where we’d recommend the surface be sprayed and backrolled and get your feedback or answer questions you might have.

Sprayers themselves haven’t changed much in the last 10 years but the tips they use have. Tips are now excellent at atomizing the paint (making a very fine mist) and delivering the paint to the painted surface reliably. We use Graco paint sprayers and they are high tech, very expensive machines specifically designed to do what we’re doing as professional painters. Spraying produces the nicest looking finish, the most uniform coating, and when used by a professional painter gives the customer the highest quality product most efficiently. In the hands of experienced painters, 1 pass with a sprayer over a properly prepared surface will produce a better coating than multiple passes with a brush and roller.

section1.h2: Your Expert Prairie Village KS, Painters

section2.h3: Why Choose Us For Painting Services In Prairie Village?
section2.copy:
Color selection is one of the most important choices a homeowner is faced with, we help as much as possible and stay up to date with trends in color and building styles so we can create whatever modern or traditional aesthetic that you're going for.

While we’re big believers in style and job quality, we don’t compromise on health and safety. That’s why our house painters only use low VOC paints, which reduce exposure to harmful gases while we paint your home or business. 

Transforming your home doesn’t need to mean exposing yourself to harmful air quality or toxic fumes. We're fully insured painters and provide you with detailed, written estimates after we carefully evaluate your home. 

This estimate comes supplemented with photographs that give in-depth explanations of the condition of your home and any wood rot repair(s) that our estimator notes which are also itemzied on the estimate. We can discuss our painting methods, how you can save, and give you an itemized quote so there are no surprises. 

We go above and beyond to help our customers understand how they can get the most bang for their buck while simultaneously increasing the value of their homes.

about.copy:
House painters have a tall order: to increase the resale value of a home, liven up the space with color, carefully prep and carry out the paint job efficiently without compromising on quality, and ensure that we maintain a high standard of safety and protection for both human health and the home’s interior.

Thankfully, it’s nothing our painters can’t handle. When we paint the interior of your house, we take care to fix any damage to walls such as cracks or dings in the drywall. We take careful precautions to protect your walls from moisture and are experts in color selection and precision painting.

section4.h3: Interior & Exterior Painters in Prairie Village KS
section4.copy:
Exterior painting can consist of painting guest houses, sheds, garages, wood siding, stucco, and much more.  With extensive experience painting home exteriors in the Kansas City area, we have considerable knowledge of the best techniques to get the job done right.

When it comes to painting home exteriors, skimping on the quality will show. This is because your home's exterior is exposed to the elements and without a high-quality paint job that takes all of these factors into consideration, you risk damage from the elements, whether that be mildew or dry rot. 

This is no minor expense to fix, either. Having to go back and fix damage like wood rot can set you back by thousands of dollars. Our experienced house painters make sure that we lay the necessary prep work before we get to painting your home’s exterior so that you aren’t stuck with a low-quality paint job that will need to be redone within just a few years. 

You won't be disappointed with our paint job, which is carefully meticulous and will transform the entire vibe of your home. When it comes to interior painting, we don't discriminate; we do it all!
